# The `ThunkInserterPass` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Basic implementation of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunctionpass">MachineFunctionPass</a> wrapping one or more <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/thunkinserter">ThunkInserter</a></code>s passed as type parameters. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Basic implementation of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunctionpass">MachineFunctionPass</a> wrapping one or more <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/thunkinserter">ThunkInserter</a></code>s passed as type parameters.
